shortdesc.ph: Occurs when a remote user (COMMUNICATION)/ host (LIVE_BROADCASTING) joins the channel.
Occurs when a remote user (COMMUNICATION)/ host (LIVE_BROADCASTING) joins the channel.

ul.li: Occurs when a remote user or host joins the channel. Occurs when a remote user or host joins the channel. The SDK also triggers this callback to report the existing hosts in the channel when a user joins the channel. The SDK also triggers this callback to report the existing hosts in the channel when a user joins the channel.

In a live-broadcast channel, this callback indicates that a host joins the channel. In a live-broadcast channel, this callback indicates that a host joins the channel. section.p: The SDK triggers this callback under one of the following circumstances: The SDK triggers this callback under one of the following circumstances:

ul.li: A remote user/host joins the channel by calling the method. A remote user/host joins the channel by calling the method.
A remote user switches the user role to the host by calling the method after joining the channel. A remote user switches the user role to the host by calling the method after joining the channel.
A remote user/host rejoins the channel after a network interruption. A remote user/host rejoins the channel after a network interruption.
The host injects an online media stream into the channel by calling the method. The host injects an online media stream into the channel by calling the method.
